From fjords to the blockchain - Bitstamp now accepts NOK!
Bitstamp now accepts Norwegian Krona (NOK) for fiat deposits and withdrawals, providing greater convenience and flexibility for users in Norway.

We're excited to announce that Bitstamp is now accepting Norwegian Krona (NOK) for fiat deposits and withdrawals. This expansion of our supported fiat currencies comes as part of our continuous strive to improve our services and offer greater convenience.

Our existing Norwegian users can now easily deposit NOK to buy crypto or withdraw it to their bank accounts without the need for conversions by banks.

The addition of NOK to our platform further demonstrates our commitment to making crypto accessible to all. On to the next one!
From fjords to the blockchain - Bitstamp now accepts NOK
